name: GAS MAYHEM!
description:
WARNING: HTML version is experimental GAS MAYHEM!

The gas seller has gone mad! You can try to fight the madness inside your head and still deliver gas to the people, but you will not earn as many points as embracing madness and providing chaos!

Press keyboard arrows <- or -> to throw canisters.

Made by:

Daniel Cuestas

Guilherme Felipe
developers: Guilherme Felipe de C. G. da Silva
